favourite.article: What a wonderful prayer. Lord to see Your purpose through!
"Jesus, most precious One to me, I want to seek You constantly So you can spread through me." O, Jesus, living One, I love You.
I would just call upon Your name! Oh Lord Jesus!
Lord we belong to You. All we can give to You is our whole being.

Amen for the blood of the lamb and for the free gift of salvation.This was my first Lord's day meeting song. Every time I hear this song I am reminded of Gods grace and mercy in bringing me to His house. Amen.
The Lord's sweetness endures. "I will sing to the Lord as long as I live; I will sing praise to my God while I have being."

Lord we want You to have Your way, Lord save us from being Satanâ€™s prey, we are believing You!! All we can give to You, our Lord, is our whole being, love outpoured; Lord, we belong to You. Jesus, faithful God, gain us through and through; use us thoroughly to see Your purpose through!
Praise the Lord for this song : )
Praise the Lord for His Living Word!
This song is amazing.
Even though I am only 13 I have experienced the Lord throughout my entire lifetime. This is the only thing that will save you from death. The key is Jesus our Savior and Lord!
This song is loving. I just want to cry.

My brother Fredrick and I attended a young people's conference in North Carolina in 2010 or 2011. My brother was new to the church life and had never experienced the way the Lord's recovery before. He believes in the Lord Jesus, but he has never been baptized. I love that boy. He really liked this song, and I do too.

I attended the College-Age Conference in Spring 2003, at Heckfield Place, UK. The title of the conference was "Born to Live". We sang this many times during the conference, and I touched my spirit. Amen, Jesus, faithful God, gain us through and through, use us thoroughly, to see Your purpose through.
This song is really beautiful. It's really nice to sing the slow part and fast part at the same time.
Great song to start the day with! Lord, let me enter into Your heart today, and abide there...
Lord Jesus, I am a sinner. Have mercy on me.
This is a touching song. I want to seek You constantly.
Today we went to a beach singing this song. It's really an awesome song! Oh Lord, You are the living Word of God!

Again I enjoyed so much singing this hymn this morning. Whenever I hear this song, there is the freshness. This song never grows old. The Lord is always new. He alone is new. Jesus is the living word of God. He is the "rhema word" that we can apply in every situation we have. Praise the Lord!

While I was singing this song with the children in the meeting this morning, I was very touched and encouraged. What a precious and faithful Lord we have! Let's seek Him constantly that He would spread through us. Amen.

This hymm is one of my favorite, if not the most. :) I am never tired of listening to it over and over again. It reminds me that the Lord Jesus, the most precious One, is living in me. I feel loved by the Lord always. Thank You Lord Jesus! I love You too.
Lord, I want You to have Your way!
I enjoy singing this song because the lyrics to it really helps me to see this desire that I have for the Lord. Jesus, oh living Word of God, most precious One to me.
Thank the Lord. I'd like to join this song with saints. According to the lyrics, Jesus is the living Word of God! How marvelous and tremendous!
This song was sung over and over at Camp Canby!

I like this song because when I sing this its touches my spirit to be burn with Lord. Its really bring me peace and joy with the Lord. When I sing this song, I feel that the Lord washed me again with His precious blood. He is living because He always save me when I'm down from Satan's prey.

I sang this today with my grandaughter while she was home for lunch. Surely this hymn brings us nearer to the Lord for us to enjoy Him and for Him to melt our hearts. How I love Him! Lord do gain us thoroughly in all our enviroments.
This song is amzing "Jesus oh living word in me"
This song touches me a lot. Whenever I am down, I listen to this song and lifted me up. I LOVE U, LORD!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This song is so beautiful, it touches me everytime i sing it. Its one of those songs we can really sing/declare in a prayerful way to the Lord. "All I can give to you my Lord, is my whole being love outpoured. Lord, I belong to You". Oh Lord Jesus, never from you would I depart, I am believing You!!! Jesus, living one, Flood me thoroughly, Take my willing heart and overcome in me!!!

"Jesus, Oh living One in me, Open my eyes that I might see All that You are to me." I really enjoy listening to this song because the lyrics are so powerful. Being a teenager, there are so many mundane distractions and just taking the time to listen to this song really brings me peace and a sense of love from the Lord.

Lord, I still love You. Been so real to me, sustain me when I'm down, because I know that You are always there with me. Been true and pure is the only way to get to You and to let You stay in my heart. I open my heart wide to You willingly and embrace You whole heartily. The song not only inspires and uplifts me, but also shows me the way to get to our Lord Jesus!!!

I like this song because of the melody. Also 2 years ago, I went to a camp and learned this song but I thought I could never hear this song again. until one day my friend introduced this web to me and I saw the song of this name. This song always reminded me of God's steadfast love. Whenever I have trouble or am sad, I would listen to this song.
